Description: Job descriptionEPIC Consulting is seeking a Quality, Health, Safety, and Environment (QHSE) Consultant with experience working with consultancy or certification body.QHSE Consultant major responsibility is to develop EPIC Consulting client’s system on ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001 and provide training on ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001 standards and other safety topics.Key Duties & Responsibilities: Develop and implement ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001 standards for EPIC Clients in Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and implement good industry practice.·       Ensure that while providing consultancy EPIC clients get certification on time.·       Prepare the company’s manual control and supervise all amendments and revisions.·       Conduct audits to evaluate the effectiveness of systems and procedures and participate in improving and developing quality practices.·       Conduct QHSE training courses. For example, ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001 Lead Auditor, Fire Safety, First Aid, IOSH, OSHA 30 hours etc.·       Conduct regular risk assessments.·       Conduct certification audit as per certification body requirements.Skills
